Withdrawal fees for some of our assets increased
We’re introducing changes to withdrawal fees for some of the assets at Bitstamp.

We made an increase of withdrawal fees for certain assets in light of the rising costs of the transactions. See the list of all the updated withdrawal fees at Bitstamp below:

  • Ethereum (ETH) - 0.005 ETH per withdrawal
  • Tether (USDT) - 20 USDT per withdrawal
  • Alpha Finance (ALPHA) - 30 ALPHA per withdrawal
  • Axie Infinity (AXS) - 0.15 AXS per withdrawal
  • Basic Attention Token (BAT) - 25 BAT per withdrawal
  • Chiliz (CHZ) - 75 CHZ per withdrawal
  • Compound (COMP) - 0.1 COMP per withdrawal
  • Curve (CRV) - 7 CRV per withdrawal
  • Enjin (ENJ) - 9 ENJ per withdrawal
  • Fetch.ai (FET) - 20 FET per withdrawal
  • FTX Token (FTT) - 0.6 FTT per withdrawal
  • The Graph (GRT) - 22 GRT per withdrawal
  • Kyber Network (KNC) - 15 KNC per withdrawal
  • Rari Governance Token (RGT) - 1 RGT per withdrawal
  • The Sandbox (SAND) - 6 SAND per withdrawal
  • SKALE Network (SKL) - 98 SKL per withdrawal
  • Synthetix (SNX) - 4 SNX per withdrawal
  • Storj (STORJ) - 15 STORJ per withdrawal
  • SushiSwap (SUSHI) - 1.5 SUSHI per withdrawal
  • yearn.finance (YFI) - 0.0007 YFI per withdrawal
  • Ox (ZRX) - 12 per withdrawal

The changes we are introducing will allow us to keep providing a trading venue that meets the demands of the quickly evolving crypto markets. We’re grateful for your support and will continue offering the most secure and reliable trading services possible.

We will keep you updated about the fees on our blog.
